Class Storefront

extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class where the program will run to interact with the user. My goal is to keep it as organized as possible.

      • userAddToCart

        public static void userAddToCart​(java.util.Scanner scnr,
                                 ShoppingCart cart,
                                 int itemIndex,
                                 InventoryManager inventory)
        This method calls other methods to add the item the user chose to the cart ArrayList
        Parameters:
        scnr - - yes or no input
        cart - - arraylist holding the objects in the user's shopping cart
        itemIndex - - when the user designates this value by typing it in the while loop above
        inventory - - the object used to call from the Inventory Manager
